lines.text: If he doesn't show up, I'll break his neck. And if he does show up, I'll kill him!
Yeah, I've heard that before, too. That's why I'm a sergeant instead of a captain.
He's colder than a pawn broker's handshake.
I figured I'd go after some smart money.
Are you all through with that?
Mister, there is no smart money.
This is a sad number, folks. As a matter of fact, last week in Philadelphia, the critics agreed it was one of the saddest things they'd ever seen.
